mapper.select: select mno, mname, mpath, memail, mpno, mgender, mpass, mbase_addr as mbaseAddr, mdet_addr as mdetAddr, mbirth, mleader_yn as mleaderYN, menter_yn as menterYN, mapply_yn as mapplyYn, mplay_cnt as mplayCnt, mgoal_cnt as mgoalCnt, msupport_cnt as msupportCnt, mloss_cnt as mlossCnt, mposname from member where tno = #{tno}

select mno, mname, mpath, memail, mpno, mgender, mpass, mbase_addr as mbaseAddr, mdet_addr as mdetAddr, mbirth, mleader_yn as mleaderYN, menter_yn as menterYN, mapply_yn as mapplyYn, mplay_cnt as mplayCnt, mgoal_cnt as mgoalCnt, msupport_cnt as msupportCnt, mloss_cnt as mlossCnt, mposname, mapply_tno as mapplyTno from member where mapply_tno = #{tno} and tno is null and menter_yn = 'N' and mapply_yn = 'Y'

select mno, mname, mpath, memail, mpno, mgender, mpass, mbase_addr as mbaseAddr, mdet_addr as mdetAddr, mbirth, mleader_yn as mleaderYN, menter_yn as menterYN, mapply_yn as mapplyYn, mplay_cnt as mplayCnt, mgoal_cnt as mgoalCnt, msupport_cnt as msupportCnt, mloss_cnt as mlossCnt, mposname from member where mno = #{mno}
